changeSet.id: Update received quality of existing shipment containers and specimens
changeSet.sql: update os_shipment_specimens set received_quality='Acceptable' where received_quality='ACCEPTABLE'
update os_shipment_specimens set received_quality='Unacceptable' where received_quality='UNACCEPTABLE'
update os_shipment_specimens_aud set received_quality='Acceptable' where received_quality = '0'
update os_shipment_specimens_aud set received_quality='Unacceptable' where received_quality = '1'
update os_shipment_containers set received_quality='Acceptable' where received_quality='ACCEPTABLE'
update os_shipment_containers set received_quality='Unacceptable' where received_quality='UNACCEPTABLE'
update os_shipment_containers_aud set received_quality='Acceptable' where received_quality = '0'
update os_shipment_containers_aud set received_quality='Unacceptable' where received_quality = '1'
